description:
This collection of dashboards (**Hardware Sentry**) leverages the [`hw.*` metrics](/metric/summary?filter=hw.) collected by [Hardware Sentry OpenTelemetry Collector](https://www.sentrysoftware.com/products/hardware-sentry-opentelemetry-collector.html).

| Dashboard | Description |
|---|---|
| [Hardware Sentry - Observability & Sustainability](/dash/integration/Hardware%20Sentry%20-%20Main) | Overview of all monitored hosts, with a focus on sustainability |
| **Hardware Sentry - Site** (this dashboard) | Metrics associated to one *site* (a data center or a server room) and its monitored *hosts* |
| [Hardware Sentry - Host](/dash/integration/Hardware%20Sentry%20-%20Host) | Metrics associated to one *host* and its internal devices |

## Site

A *site* represents a data center or a server room. Select a site with the `$site` dashboard variable. 

This dashboard is split in 5 sections:

* Summary of what is monitored in the selected *site*
* Power consumption, electricity cost and carbon emissions
* Temperature optimization and potential reduction in carbon emissions
* List of hosts in the *site* -- **Click on a host > View hardware dashboard** to go to the *Hardware Sentry - Host* dashboard of the selected host
* Inventory

## How to configure *sites*?

*Sites* are determined from the `site` label in the `hw.*` metrics that are displayed in this dashboard. The `site` label is added by **Hardware Sentry OpenTelemetry Collector** when collecting hardware metrics.

Install an instance of [Hardware Sentry OpenTelemetry Collector](https://www.sentrysoftware.com/products/hardware-sentry-opentelemetry-collector.html) in each data center or server room. For each, [configure **hws-config.yaml**](https://www.sentrysoftware.com/docs/hws-otel-collector/latest/configuration/configure-agent.html) to specify the characteristics of the *site* as in the example below:

```yaml
extraLabels:
  site: Datacenter 1 # Customize with your own site naming

extraMetrics:
  hw.site.carbon_density_grams: 350 # in g/kWh
  hw.site.electricity_cost_dollars: 0.12 # in $/kWh
  hw.site.pue_ratio: 1.8
```
title: Hardware Sentry - Site

definition.query: tag:(integration:hardware-sentry) group_status:(alert OR warn OR "no data") group:$site
definition.title: Current Hardware Issues

definition.content: Estimation of the savings and CO₂ reduction by increasing the temperature of the site to the above recommendation.

custom_links.link: /event/explorer?live=false&from_ts={{timestamp_start}}&to_ts={{timestamp_end}}&query=integration:hw {{$site}} status:(error OR warn OR "no data" OR info) {{host}}

definition.title: Hosts Monitored in $site.value (Click on a host to view its dashboard)
